benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId} - Retrieve an account by id

covered: GET Method - Valid Request: 200 for existing account (TC01)
GET Method - Empty Response: 404 when no accounts exist or account not found (TC07, TC08)
Query Parameters - Comprehensive coverage: accountWithBalance, accountWithBalanceAndCBA, audit levels (TC02-TC06, TC24, TC25, TC30-33)
Authorization - Proper handling of missing/invalid tokens (TC10, TC11)
Error Handling - Invalid accountId format (400), service unavailable (503) (TC09, TC12)
Input Sanitization - Injection (TC13) and XSS (TC14) scenarios
Performance/Resilience - Timeout (TC16) and recovery under failure (TC26)
Large Payload - Large account with many fields/transactions (TC17)
Regression test for previously fixed bug (TC22)
gaps: Pagination: Not applicable for GET by ID, but no explicit pagination tests exist for large datasets
Rate Limiting: No tests for rate limiting/throttling
Caching Behavior: No tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control)
Authorization: No explicit 403 Forbidden scenario for insufficient permissions
recommendations: Add pagination tests only if endpoint evolves to return lists; otherwise current tests suffice for by-id retrieval
Introduce rate limiting and throttling tests for high-load scenarios
Add tests to validate caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) and caching behavior
Include 403 Forbidden scenarios to cover insufficient permissions beyond authentication
